That's the main draw back of the boxes, it relies on plenitful radio
stations for the raw audio. I think the entities know what they are working
with though for any given box/situation though.

A multi-turn rate control works really well, but those run about $15--or
more.

 F-S

> > The silver dial that controls the speed of the scan, if you can add a

> >
> > For me I need to be able to turn the device on and record for a client,

> record.

> > I am going to see if I can find or make a sticker to place under the

> >
> > Again, so far I love it! Especially knowing I will likely not need to use

> >
